description: Way better than Polari, WhatsApp-style interface and quite easy to use. Sad it doesn't save connections though.

If you can get past the lack of visual configuration options for now, then Srain is the best of the best. It's (again, aside from the lack of config) very user-friendly and fits right in with other GNOME apps. So much better than literally anything else I've tried with just a tiny bit of manual configuration.
summary: The best IRC client for GNOME
